name: Project Summoner
description:
Note: A gamepad is recquired to play.

Project Summoner is a fast paced boss rush action game. You play as a detective and his 2 demon partners and take on a colorful cast of bosses in deadly summoner combat.

For this public playtest version, there are 2 boss fights available for you to challenge.

As this is a work in progress, many aspects are not final and bugs may be found.

As part of the public playtest, please fill out the feedback questionnaire:

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScL3y2OESqCOjbXQyAxL6qu_vGVftOWP8XMzv7W...

Direction, programming, game design: https://twitter.com/jesperqwop42
Art direction, graphics: https://twitter.com/KulPlant
